name: Mega Tank Blasta
overview: A rogue agent has broken out of a U.S. high security prison. He smuggles himself a gun boat and he is now spreading chaos and carnage across 3 different parts of the world. Sightings of the gun boat has been spotted in the docks near a city in the UK. Your mission is to send your heavy armored tank through the three different war zones, and destroy the enemy forces. Then if you can get far enough, head your way through the city to the docks and fight the spy in his stolen gun boat (and of course destroy it with him inside it). Shoot anything that shoots, collect power ups in parachutes to gain more firing ability. Have fun. This game works on PAL machines only (or an eumulator in PAL emulation mode)
